headline.main: A Western Front: Is Iraq Next?

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''A Month in a Difficult Battlefield: Assessing U.S. War Strategy'' (front page, Nov. 8): During the Vietnam War, the military establishment told us frequently over many years that it was making progress and could win the war if only it had a bit more time and a bit more money.
abstract: Alice L Givan letter, commenting on Nov 8, urges skepticism on military establishment's assessments of how war in Afghanistan is going
